summary.para: The KERB_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE structure contains information about an interactive logon profile.
This structure is used by the function.

member.name: KERB_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.MessageType
member.summary: value identifying the type of logon request being made. This member can be set to KerbInteractiveProfile.

member.name: KERB_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.LogonCount
member.summary: Number of times the user is currently logged on.

member.name: KERB_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.BadPasswordCount
member.summary: Number of times a bad password was applied to the account since the last successful logon.

member.name: KERB_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.LogonTime
member.summary: Time when the user last logged on. This is an absolute-format standard time value.

member.name: KERB_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.LogoffTime
member.summary: Time when user should log off. This is an absolute-format standard time value.

member.name: KERB_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.KickOffTime
member.summary: Time when system should force user logoff. This is an absolute-format standard time value.

member.name: KERB_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.PasswordLastSet
member.summary: Time and date the password was last set. This is an absolute-format standard time value.

member.name: KERB_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.PasswordCanChange
member.summary: Time and date when the user can change the password. This is an absolute-format standard time value. To prevent a password from ever changing, set this member to a date very far into the future.

member.name: KERB_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.PasswordMustChange
member.summary: Time and date when the user must change the password. If the user can never change the password, this member is undefined. This is an absolute-format standard time value.

member.name: KERB_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.LogonScript
member.summary: containing the relative path to the account's logon script.

member.name: KERB_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.ProfilePath
member.summary: containing the path to a user's roaming profile. This is used only if the user has a roaming profile.

member.name: KERB_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.HomeDirectoryDrive
member.summary: containing the drive containing the user's home directory.

member.name: KERB_INTERACTIVE_PROFILE.LogonServer
member.summary: containing the name of the server that processed the logon request.

summary.para: Specifies how this user established the session. This can be one or more of the following flags.

listheader.description: The user logged on using extra security identifiers (SIDs).
The user logged on using a domain local group.
